short_summary: Procurement for flexible couplings and engine mounts for the CCGS Molly Kool.
description: Department of Fisheries & Oceans has a need for a specific type of equipment for a ship: flexible couplings and engine mounts. The contractor will be responsible for delivering the goods to the Department of Fisheries & Oceans. The procurement  is being handled by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
### Advanced Contract Award Notice: F6855-230480
#### Contract Title
Flexible Couplings and Engine Mounts for CCGS Molly Kool

#### Contract Details
* Contract Number: F6855-230480
* Solicitation Number: WS4156792251
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) and Canadian Coast Guard (CCG)

#### Tender Details
* Tender Status: Expired
* Tender Closing Date: 12 September 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: 21 September 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Ongoing
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Advanced Contract Award Notice

#### Contract Details
* UNSPSC Code: 31163000 (Couplings)
* Procurement Category: GD
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Goods to be Procured
The Department of Fisheries & Oceans has a requirement to procure flexible couplings and engine mounts for the CCGS Molly Kool.

#### Contact Information
* Grant, Jonathan (SPAC/PSPC) - jonathan.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
